articles.description: Schweppes Oaks favourite Affair To Remember is safely in the final field for Saturday’s Group I contest at Morphettville.
articles.content:
Schweppes Oaks favourite Affair To Remember is safely in the final field for Saturday’s Group I contest at Morphettville.
Ballarat trainer Dan O’Sullivan admitted to a few worries on Monday when the filly was 19th in the order of entry. However, she is among… [+536 chars]

articles.title: Outside draw for Sunlight in TAB Classic at Morphettville - Racenet
articles.description: The barrier draw has done multiple Group I winner Sunlight no favours for Saturday’s Group I TAB Classic (1200m) at Morphettville.
articles.content:
The barrier draw has done multiple Group I winner Sunlight no favours for Saturday’s Group I TAB Classic (1200m) at Morphettville.
Sunlight drew barrier 16 but will come into barrier 14 if the emergencies don’t get a start in the $400,000 event.

articles.title: ‘I was so pissed’: Tiger Woods on the time he got punched by Muhammad Ali - Fox Sports
articles.description: Tiger Woods has revealed how Muhammad Ali once punched him in a hotel lobby.
articles.content:
The reigning Masters champion was checking into a Hilton to play a practice round ahead of the 2004 US Open at Shinnecock Hills in New York.
While at the front desk, legendary boxer Ali, who passed in 2016 at the age of 74, sneaked up on Woods and gave him a… [+2814 chars]

articles.title: From plumbing in Adelaide to a spot on an NFL list - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Former Adelaide plumber Matt Leo has fulfilled his dream of making it to the NFL with the Philadelphia Eagles taking him as part of the league's international pathway program.
articles.content:
The 27-year-old is 201cm tall and weighs 125kg.
Leo does have an advantage over Mailata, who never played a game of American football before joining the Eagles.
Matt Leo playing college football for Iowa.Credit:Getty Images
